I have mixed feelings of this game. I like to play it, but its not fun when you are decent at the game, and get called a cheater.  This "Trust Factor" is flawed in one big way: False reports.  The trust factor bs cant distinguish if a report is actually viable, obviously.  So this is impacting my game, which i have paid alot for.  Its just not fair to people who actually have skill and noobs who get their panties in a twist if you kill them.  And the lack of communication about the trust factor doesnt help the situation at all.  I would like to get in touch and talk about my problems.  Other than that big issue I like the game.
